fields_of_interest: Trade, International co-operation and development, Education and training, Business and Industry, Research and innovation, External Relations, Trans-European Networks, Digital economy and society
eu_initiatives: Startup Europe, Agenda Digital, Comercio Internacional, Innovación, retos sociales, financiación para pymes y startups
subsection: Non-governmental organisations, platforms and networks and similar
goals__remit:
The SELATAM Assembly gathers a group of private players in the entrepreneurship ecosystems across the Atlantic, with the broad aim of building bridges between both sides.   
With the hype on other regions’ entrepreneurial ecosystems, it is worth noting that the EU has more association agreements with LATAM and the Caribbean than with any other in the world. Both regions face common opportunities and challenges brought by the Digital Revolution in terms of trade, people and talent or leading innovation. In this context, Startup Europe Latam’s objectives include facilitating startups access to those markets, increase the visibility and innovative profile of both regions,  exchange best practices to foster entrepreneurship friendly ecosystems and claim a bigger role for a common digital agenda.
relevant_communication:
Conexión y fortalecimiento de los ecosistemas de emprendimiento en Europa y América Latina: 
- manifesto por el emprendimiento entre las dos regiones 
- apoyo a la expansión de startups
